item.title: Doppio Passo Rosato Puglia IGT 2021 - CVCB
item.description: The Doppio Passo Rosato Puglia IGT by Casa Vinicola Carlo Botter has a dazzling, salmon colour. Its bouquet appears fruity and sweet, but at the same time spicy with an intense and unique aroma of blackberries and redcurrants. On the palate, the Rosato has a good structure, shows a pleasant acidity and is full-bodied. As with his big brother, the grapes for this extraordinary Primitivo Rosato are carefully selected in the most refined handwork. And just like the Doppio Passo "Rosso" the Rosato convinces with a fulminant interplay of sweetness, fruit and elegance! Enjoy the first warmer days of the year with this fruity and spicy Primitivo Rosato! Serve the Doppio Passo Primitivo Rosato with fish dishes, pasta with fine sauces and delicate sausages.
item.slug: Doppio Passo Rosato Puglia IGT 2021 - CVCB
